Game.Name: Samurai Deeper Kyo (Japan)
Game.plot: Samurai Deeper Kyo is an overhead beat 'em up based on the popular anime of the same name. The player can play as Miibu Kyoshiro, Shiina Yuya, Benitora, or Yukimura Sanada, characters from the show, who are looking for the murderer of Shiina's brother, while trying to stop the evil Demon Eyes Kyo from entering Miibu's body. The player has a CPU controlled partner character following during the game. All characters have their own weapons, and by preforming button combinations, they can perform an array of special attacks against the hordes of evil monsters the player has to defeat to progress through the linear levels.Cheat: How to unlock Arcade modeTo get arcade mode, beat the game once on Story mode at any difficulty with any character.Cheat: How to unlock Arcade modeTo play as Kyoshiro, you must beat Story mode as all four characters on any difficulty Kyoshiro uses the same weapons as Demon Eyes Kyo Note: beating Arcade mode does NOT count
Game.Notes: Unlock the mystery behind the sudden reappearance of the legendary swordsmen Demon Eyes Kyo in this fast-paced action adventure. Take up your weapons and battle against hordes of enemies, as you experience the story of Samurai Deeper Kyo! Features: Perform devastating special moves. Play as Demon Eyes Kyo, Kyoshiro Mibu, Yuya Shiina, Yukimura Sanada, or Benitora. Unlock powerful weapons and extra modes.
